text:
@redwaller66 Not really, it's like Castlevania... it's a sidescroller/platformer and illusion of gaia if i remember correctly (I haven't played that game in like 10 years) is sort of a top down view, more like the early zelda games. This game, aside from some cosmetic diffrences and controlling two characters, is just another in a long string of DS Symphony of the Night remakes. 

So no, this game isn't very similar in story, theme or gameplay. But thanks for reminding me of that great old game!
